SELECT p.project_no, p.mng_pic_no, p.project_title, to_char(p.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS p_reg_date, to_char(p.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS p_end_date, pa.mem_no pa_mem_no, m.mem_name, pos.pos_name, w.work_no, to_char(w.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS w_reg_date, to_char(w.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS w_end_date, w.file_no, w.work_prograss, w.field, w.work_intro, w.work_title, cl.cl_name, cl.cl_no, cl.check_yn, to_char(cl.check_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cl_check_date, cl.mem_no cl_mem_no, cm.cmnt_no, cm.cmnt_content, to_char(cm.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cm_reg_date, cm.WRITER_NO, wf.mem_no AS favorite_mem_no, wf.favoritey, fd.FILE_ORIGINALNAME, fd.FILE_SIZE, fd.FILE_DETAIL_NO
FROM project p LEFT JOIN work w ON p.project_no = w.project_no left join project_attendee pa on p.project_no = pa.project_no left join member m on p.mng_pic_no = m.mem_no left join POSITION pos on m.pos_no = pos.pos_no LEFT JOIN checkList cl ON w.work_no = cl.work_no LEFT JOIN work_favorite wf ON w.work_no = wf.work_no LEFT JOIN work_coment cm ON w.work_no = cm.work_no LEFT JOIN file_detail fd ON w.file_no = fd.file_no
WHERE p.project_no = #{projectNo} AND (pa.mem_no = #{memNo} OR p.mng_pic_no = #{memNo})
ORDER BY w.work_no ASC
SELECT mem_no , project_no FROM project_attendee where project_no = #{projectNo}

mapper.select: SELECT w.work_no , w.project_no , w.writer_no , to_char(w.reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') w_reg_date , to_char(w.end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') w_end_date , w.file_no , w.work_prograss , w.field , w.work_intro , w.work_title , wf.favoritey , wf.mem_no FROM work w, work_favorite wf where wf.work_no = w.work_no and wf.mem_no = #{memNo} and wf.favoritey = 'Y'

select p.project_no , p.project_title , p.mng_pic_no , w.work_no , w.work_title , w.writer_no , pa.mem_no pa_mem_no , pic.mem_no pic_mem_no , wf.favoritey , wf.mem_no favor_mem_no from project p left join work w on p.project_no = w.project_no left join project_attendee pa on p.project_no = pa.project_no left join pic_NM pic on w.work_no = pic.work_no left join member m on pa.mem_no = m.mem_no left join work_favorite wf on w.work_no = wf.work_no where p.mng_pic_no = #{memNo} or pa.mem_no = #{memNo} or pic.mem_no = #{memNo} or w.writer_no = #{memNo} or wf.mem_no = #{memNo}

select count(case when work_prograss = 'wait' then 1 end) chartWorkWite ,count(case when work_prograss = 'ing' then 1 end) ingWork ,count(case when work_prograss = 'end' then 1 end) endWork from work where project_no = #{projectNo}

select count(case when cl.check_yn != 'Y' then 1 end) NcheckCount from work w join checkList cl on w.work_no = cl.work_no where w.project_No = #{projectNo}

select m.mem_name memName, pos.pos_Name posName, count(distinct case when w.end_date > sysdate then w.work_no end) memNowWork, count(distinct case when w.end_date < sysdate and w.field < 100 then w.work_no end) unfinishedWork, count(distinct case when w.field >= 100 and work_prograss = 'end' then w.work_no end) finishedWork, count(case when cl.mem_no = #{memNo} and cl.check_yn = 'Y' then 1 end) checkCount, count(case when cl.check_yn != 'Y' then 1 end) NcheckCount from project p join work w on p.project_no = w.project_no join pic_nm pic on w.work_no = pic.work_no join checkList cl on w.work_no = cl.work_no join member m on pic.mem_no = m.mem_no join position pos on m.pos_no = pos.pos_no where p.project_no = #{projectNo} and pic.mem_no = #{memNo} group by m.mem_name, pos.pos_Name
